sourcesContent:
import React,{useContext} from 'react' import { Section, ContainerLogOut, LogOut, Div, Nick, AnotherDiv, Imagem, Figure, TextContainer, Nome, Email, Localidade, FollowContainer, FollowersContainer, Followers, Following, Repositorio, Text, BioContainer, Bio, BioText } from './styles'; import { FiLogOut} from 'react-icons/fi' import { context } from '../../context'; import { useHistory} from 'react-router-dom'; const UserContainer = props => { const history = useHistory() const history1 = useHistory() const ctx = useContext(context) return (
{props.nick} {ctx.loggedUser && ( Sair )} {!ctx.loggedUser && ( Salvar )}
{props.name} {props.email} {props.localidade} history.push("/Followers")}> {props.followers} Seguidores history.push('/Following')}> {props.following} Seguindo history.push('/Repos')}> {props.reps} Repositórios BIO {props?.biotext}
)} export default UserContainer;
